title.narrative: Readmission Case Management Systems (RCMS) Pakistan Phase II

description.narrative: The project aims to contribute to enhanced capacity of the Government of Pakistan for improved governance of return and readmission process by supporting implementation of the Readmission Case Management System Project (RCMS). The RCMS was developed Pakistan's National Database and Registration Authority (NADRA), in close coordination with IOM Pakistan and the European Readmission Capacity Building Facility (EURCAP), funded by the European Union. The system aims to support the implementation of the EU-Pakistan Readmission Agreement through an efficient automated readmission case management for time-efficiency and real-time data access for all actors involved in the return process. Ongoing consultations with the government stakeholders, especially Ministries of Interior and Foreign Affairs, have postulated the need for design and implementation of complementary activities that would contribute towards sustainability of the RCMS project. Therefore, in light of the above, the project aims to provide additional support for implementation of the RCMS support action through supporting deployment of the RCMS at 7 international airports in Pakistan and conducting refresher workshops for the pilot Member States, thus contributing towards sustainability of the RCMS in Pakistan.

participating-org.narrative: Germany - Federal Office for Migration & Refugees (BAMF)

mailing-address.narrative: Plot No 4C Sector G-5/5 , Diplomatic Enclave, Islamabad 44000, Pakistan

sector.narrative: Facilitation of orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility

policy-marker.narrative: Project with some but insufficient inclusion of gender issues

provider-org.narrative: Germany - Federal Office for Migration & Refugees (BAMF)
